website_summaries.verdict: Quality track and field shoe, with high-tech features for documented better performance.
pros: Sharkskin outsole for superior grip and less weight, allowing for more aggressive approach into the pit
Synthetic leather upper gives excellent support while still lightweight and breathable
Synthetic overlay across the toe box protects and holds foot during takeoff
Molded EVA midsole provides cushioning needed by long jumpers
Spikes contain microsuede for comfort and durability
cons: On high end of price range

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time! Two day delivery was really two ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time! Two day delivery was really two days. Size 9.5 fit my daughter's size 11 foot perfectly. She loves the shoes. Uses them for triple jump and long jump.
customer_reviews.author: BigJim

customer_reviews.title: A noticeable difference in jumping confidence!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been doing the long and triple just for several years, but this is the first jump specific shoe he has had. Because of the unique outer sole design and the added support of the longer laces and covered toe box, he has been jumping better than ever. He noted from the very first jump with these shoes, that he felt more confident and the explosion of the board was much improved. All in all, a very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Hawki Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Feel and Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!! As a professional athlete, the type of shoes you wear are very important. These shoes fit well and have great shock cushion for running down the run way as well as landing. I’d recommend these for every jumper.
customer_reviews.author: Myesha Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast shipping! Just as described and fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moore

customer_reviews.title: They have a nice shine to them
customer_reviews.text: They have a nice shine to them. The toes have a nice subtle color change. It goes from looking black to looking a little blue. It has a nice prismatic effect. They also feel great on the runway and give you a nice pop.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Long Jump Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear 7.5 size Adidas sprint spike shoes, but go for half size larger for long jump shoes. It turns out to be a perfect match. I feel comfortable when running, jumping with the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Martin Del Rio

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Adidas Shoe
customer_reviews.text: A very decent spike shoe that fit as expected at a good price. Im sure it's not the best spike out there, but definitely very good especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GilliganLovesGinger

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. he said it is very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chow

customer_reviews.title: Better than Nike spikes
customer_reviews.text: If you are accustomed to how the old adidas lj2's fit, be aware that these are not nearly as tight. There is slightly more room in the toe box, and loads more cushioning from the tongue. Way more comfortable than Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan R

customer_reviews.title: GREAT steal. Fit true to size and feels like ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe these were almost $100 less than other websites. GREAT steal. Fit true to size and feels like you're running on a cushion which is comfortable immensely! Very hard to clean though so prepare to get them dirty with sand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spikes so much! I wear them for lj and tj, they are comfortable and helped me be the best I could be
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and got it fast
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! Fits perfect and got it fast!
customer_reviews.author: JCarreon

customer_reviews.title: The 1st time he wore these he increased his best jump of the year by over a foot
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son who has tripled jumped for the past 4 years. He was having issues with spraining his right ankle from his other spikes. The 1st time he wore these he increased his best jump of the year by over a foot! I'd highly recommend these for anyone triple jumping!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 sons

customer_reviews.title: If they increase her best in long jump
customer_reviews.text: These are for my daughter. If they increase her best in long jump, then they will get a 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: paul s waller

product_meta.title: Adidas Unisex Performance Adizero Lj Track Shoe
product_meta.description: Low to the ground and built for top speed on the runway, these track and field spikes offer pure performance. The shoes are made of lightweight, breathable materials and feature a stable forefoot and streamlined design for long jump competitions.
feature_bullets: Weight: 8.5 ounces; Runner type: track; Midsole drop: 5.5 mm (heel 14.5 mm / forefoot: 9 mm)
Sharkskin-textured outsole with light weight and ultimate grip in all conditions
